Message-ID: <4F83DBB4.6090902@roland.co.jp>
Date: Tue, 10 Apr 2012 16:05:24 +0900
From: Takayuki Okada <okadat@roland.co.jp>
To: Shoichi Ikeda <ikeda@roland.co.jp>
Subject: phase spreader


　BOSS 岡田です。

　位相差９０度フィルタの件。

coef24	Ps00	= -0.97477251757813;	// 90deg
coef24	Ps01	= -0.87864063281250;
coef24	Ps02	= -0.56112626562500;
coef24	Ps03	=  0.37579300000000;
coef24	Ps10	= -0.99305400000000;
coef24	Ps11	= -0.94171569335938;
coef24	Ps12	= -0.76238464257812;
coef24	Ps13	= -0.22889384375000;

  以下が中山さん資料フォルダです。
\\ROSE05SV\Shared\RSSapplicationProject2010\PhaseSpreader

　以上です。






Message-ID: <9072A09BC51844D49AB0F475EE97365B@ROSE.roland.co.jp>
From: "Tadashi Nakayama" <nakayama@roland.co.jp>
To: <ikeda@roland.co.jp>
Subject: 左右位相差９０度フィルタ係数
Date: Tue, 10 Apr 2012 16:14:08 +0900

中山です。
係数テーブルです。（図参照）
 
// sPhaseTbl[n][m][0] phase > sPhaseTbl[n][m][1] phase
// fs : 44.1kHz
static const double sPhaseTbl[37][4][2] = {
{                                        // (0deg)
{-0.5,-0.5},
{-0.5,-0.5},
{-0.5,-0.5},
{-0.5,-0.5}
},{                                        // 5deg
{-0.97668612109375, -0.97831812109375},
{-0.83824836718750, -0.84527629687500},
{-0.37519451367188, -0.39474261523437},
{ 0.99891736328125,  0.95496590820312}
},{                                        // 10deg
{-0.97841145703125, -0.98125376367188},
{-0.86135863671875, -0.87288386328125},

PS00 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][0][0];
PS01 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][1][0];
PS02 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][2][0];
PS03 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][3][0];
PS10 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][0][1];
PS11 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][1][1];
PS12 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][2][1];
PS13 = sPhaseTbl[ spr_phs ][3][1];
---
